original_text: That is the second great trouble and it has now finished. But the third great trouble will come soon.
korean_text: 둘째 화는 지나갔으나 보라 셋째 화가 속히 이르는도다

sentences.original_text: That is the second great trouble
But the third great trouble will come soon
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 세 번째 큰 환난은 곧 올 것입니다
